TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement
Public MustInherit Class SecurityBindingElement Inherits BindingElement

summary.span: 抽象類別 (Abstract Class)，其在實作時可表示支援通道 SOAP 訊息安全性的繫結項目。

span.span: An abstract class that, when implemented, represents a binding element that supports channel SOAP message security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 中 SOAP 訊息安全性繫結項目的基底類別 (Base Class)。This class is the base class for the SOAP message security binding elements in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]. 這個抽象類別有三種實作：、 和 。There are three implementations of this abstract class: , , and . 這些實作會建立以 WS-Security Policy 規格定義之繫結的模型。These implementations model the bindings defined in the WS-Security Policy specification. 自訂繫結包含以特定順序排列的繫結項目之集合：第一個會新增代表繫結堆疊頂端的項目，第二個新增繫結堆疊中次一項目，依此類推。A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element that represents the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack is added second, and so on. 若要將這個類別新增至繫結，請執行下列動作：To add this class to a binding, do the following: 1. 建立 。Create a . 2. 建立在繫結堆疊中位於此繫結項目上方的自訂繫結項目，例如選擇性的 和 。Create a custom binding element that is above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional and . 3. 依先前所述的順序，使用 方法將這些項目新增至 。Add these elements in the order previously described to the using the method. 4. 建立自 衍生之安全性繫結項目的執行個體，例如 、 或 。Create an instance of a security binding element derived from , such as , , or . 5. 將衍生的安全性繫結項目新增至集合。Add the derived security binding element to the collection. 6. 將其他任何自訂繫結項目新增至集合中，例如 。Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as . [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 使用，請參閱[SecurityBindingElement 驗證模式](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/securitybindingelement-authentication-modes.md)和[How to： 建立自訂繫結使用 SecurityBindingElement](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-custom-binding-using-the-securitybindingelement.md)。 using a , see [SecurityBindingElement Authentication Modes](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/securitybindingelement-authentication-modes.md) and [How to: Create a Custom Binding Using the SecurityBindingElement](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-custom-binding-using-the-securitybindingelement.md). > [!NOTE] > 一旦建立 物件之後，您就應該將它的屬性視為不變的屬性。Once a object is created, you should treat its properties as immutable. 在某些屬性上呼叫 `set` 可能會產生無法預測的結果：繫結的行為可能如同屬性保留舊的值一般，而且執行階段錯誤是發生問題的唯一徵兆。Calling `set` on some properties may have unpredictable effects: the binding may behave as if the property retained its old value, with a runtime failure being the only indication of an issue. 已知可能出現這種行為的兩個屬性是 和 。Two properties known to behave this way are and . 另外可能還有其他屬性也會出現同樣的狀況。There may be other properties of which this is also true.

[!code-csharp[c_CustomBindingsAuthMode#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_custombindingsauthmode/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[c_CustomBindingsAuthMode#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_custombindingsauthmode/vb/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援權杖會為繫結提供主要權杖內所含宣告以外的其他宣告。Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the primary tokens for the binding. 由 傳回的集合包含由端點定義之所有作業的其他權杖參數 ()。The collection returned by the contains additional token parameters () for all operations defined by an endpoint. 主要權杖參數可在 或 (兩者均繼承自 類別) 上找到。The primary token parameters are found on either the or the (both inherit from the class). 如果是 ，主要權杖參數會由 屬性傳回。In the case of the , the primary token parameters are returned by the property. 項目上有兩個參數屬性： 和 屬性。On the element there are two parameter properties, the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 這些屬性稱為參數，因為它們只指定安全性權杖的型別，而不是實際值。The properties are called parameters because they specify only the type of the security token, not the actual values. > > 支援權杖的範圍可以設定在端點層級，在此情況下，它們會包含在所有由用戶端傳送到服務的安全訊息中。Supporting tokens can be scoped at the endpoint level, in which case they are included in all secured messages sent by the client to the service. 服務會強制所有來自用戶端的安全訊息包含由這個屬性設定的支援權杖型別。The service enforces that all secured messages from the client contain the supporting token types configured by this property. > > 如果只要為一個作業 (而非端點上的所有作業) 提供支援權杖，請使用 屬性。To provide supporting tokens only for an operation (not all operations on an endpoint), use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些是本機設定，因為它們並未發行成為服務之安全性原則的一部分，因此不會影響用戶端的繫結。The settings are local because they are not published as part of the security policy of the service and do not affect the client's binding. 物件的下列屬性可以協助降低阻絕服務 (DOS) 安全性攻擊：The following properties of the object can help mitigate a denial-of-service (DOS) security attack: - ：控制在執行 SPNEGO 或 SSL 交涉之後，伺服器所快取有時間界限之 `SecurityContextToken` 的上限。: controls the maximum number of time-bounded `SecurityContextToken`s that are cached by the server after doing SPNEGO or SSL negotiation. - ：控制在 SPNEGO 或 SSL 交涉之後，伺服器所發出的 `SecurityContextToken` 的存留期 (Lifetime)。: controls the lifetime of the `SecurityContextToken`s that are issued by the server following SPNEGO or SSL negotiation. 伺服器在這段時間內會快取 `SecurityContextToken`。The server caches the `SecurityContextToken`s for this period of time. - ：控制在伺服器中建立的安全對話上限，但是不會針對這些對話處理應用程式訊息。: controls the maximum number of secure conversations that are established at the server but for which no application messages have been processed. 這個配額會防止用戶端在服務中建立安全對話，由此服務會針對每個用戶端保留對話狀態，但不會使用這些對話。This quota prevents clients from establishing secure conversations at the service, thereby causing the service to maintain state for each client, but never using them. - ：控制服務讓安全對話保持運作，而不會從中接收應用程式訊息的時間上限。: controls the maximum time that the service keeps a secure conversation alive without ever receiving an application message on it. 這個配額會防止用戶端在服務中建立安全對話，由此服務會針對每個用戶端保留對話狀態，但不會使用這些對話。This quota prevents clients from establishing secure conversations at the service, thereby causing the service to maintain state for each client, but never using them. 在安全對話工作階段中，請注意繫結上的 和 `ReceiveTimeout` 屬性都會影響工作階段逾時。In a secure conversation session, note that both and the `ReceiveTimeout` property on the binding affect session timeout. 其中時間較短的屬性值會決定逾時發生的時間。The shorter of the two determines when timeouts occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含多種屬性，這些屬性會指定保護在通道上交換之訊息的安全時所使用不同安全性規格的版本號碼。The contains numerous properties that specify version numbers of different security specifications used when securing messages exchanged on the channel. > [!NOTE] > 一旦建立 物件之後，這個屬性就是不變的屬性。Once a object is created, this property is immutable. 在上面呼叫 `set` 不會改變它。Calling `set` on it does not change it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援權杖會為繫結提供主要權杖內所含宣告以外的其他宣告。Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the primary tokens for the binding. 由 屬性傳回的集合，包含已定義特定作業的其他權杖參數 ()。The collection returned by the property contains additional token parameters () for specific operations defined. 主要權杖參數可在 或 (兩者均繼承自 類別) 上找到。The primary token parameters are found on either the or the (both inherit from the class). 如果是 ，主要權杖參數會由 屬性傳回。In the case of the , the primary token parameters are returned by the property. 項目上有兩個參數屬性： 和 屬性。On the there are two parameter properties, the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 這些屬性稱為參數，因為它們只指定安全性權杖的型別，而不是實際值。The properties are called parameters because they specify only the type of the security token, not the actual values. 支援權杖的範圍可以設定為與繫結不同的範圍，此時範圍是作業，而在這種情況下，權杖會包含在由用戶端傳送到具有指定動作之服務的所有安全訊息中。Supporting tokens can be scoped at a different scope than the binding, in this case the operation, in which case they are included in all secured messages sent by the client to services that have the specified Action. 如果只要為一個作業 (而非端點上的所有作業) 提供支援權杖，請使用 屬性。To provide supporting tokens only for an operation (not all operations on an endpoint), use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援權杖會為繫結提供主要權杖內所含宣告以外的其他宣告。Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the primary tokens for the binding. 支援權杖的範圍可以設定為與繫結不同的範圍，此時的範圍為端點。Supporting tokens can be scoped at a different scope than the binding, in this case the endpoint. 如果訊息沒有包含對應至指定於 集合之權杖型別的權杖，服務就不會拒絕該訊息。The service does not reject the message in case it does not contain tokens that correspond to token types specified in the collection.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉包含下列成員：The enumeration contains the following members: - ： 項目會加入至安全性標頭，根據 「 使用前宣告 」 的一般原則。: Items are added to the security header according to the general principle of "declare before use". - ：項目會依符合 WSS: SOAP 訊息安全性的任何順序加入至安全性標頭中。: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP Message security. - ：項目會依符合 WSS: SOAP 訊息安全性的任何順序加入至安全性標頭中，除了安全性標頭中的第一個項目必須是 `wsse:Timestamp` 項目以外。: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP message security except that the first element in the security header must be a `wsse:Timestamp` element. - ：項目會依符合 WSS: SOAP 訊息安全性的任何順序加入至安全性標頭中，除了安全性標頭中的最後一個項目必須是 `wsse:Timestamp` 項目以外。: Items are added to the security header in any order that conforms to WSS: SOAP message security except that the last element in the security header must be a `wsse:Timestamp` element.
